projects.title: Adaptive AI Operations Console
projects.descriptionHtml: Architected a data-driven control center that orchestrates LLM prompts, monitoring, and human-in-the-loop QA. Delivered 38% faster incident resolution.

spotlight.headline: From LLM chaos to measurable action
spotlight.overview: Built a unified cockpit for incident-response analysts that connected prompt management, evaluations, and human reviews into one workflow.
highlights: Shipped a modular prompt registry with automated regression alerts
Deployed a human-in-the-loop review queue with SLA-aware routing
Instrumented dashboards wiring OpenTelemetry traces into business KPIs

walkthrough.label: Prioritize incident debt
walkthrough.summary: Clustered failing prompts by business impact and surfaced guardrail breaches so ops leaders could triage in minutes instead of sifting through spreadsheets.

walkthrough.label: Human-in-the-loop QA
walkthrough.summary: Sequenced analysts through risky conversations with context-aware prompts and auto-logging, tightening the feedback loop between ops teams and prompt owners.

walkthrough.label: Telemetry into KPIs
walkthrough.summary: Connected OpenTelemetry spans to executive dashboards, letting leadership watch incident cost burn-down and reassign teams dynamically.

sandbox.title: Scenario rehearsal sandbox
sandbox.description: Click through a pre-wired workflow that shows how prompts escalate across roles with guardrails applied.

projects.title: Realtime Insights Platform
projects.descriptionHtml: Designed and delivered a collaborative analytics portal with predictive scoring and automated alerts, boosting retention by 22%.

spotlight.headline: Turning fragmented telemetry into activation wins
spotlight.overview: Unblocked revenue teams with an always-on analytics hub that fuses predictive scoring, collaboration, and alerting into one shared surface.
highlights: Delivered schema-driven insight templates editable by go-to-market teams
Launched collaborative alerting with comment threads and slack sync
Optimized GraphQL resolvers and caching for sub-second dashboard loads

walkthrough.label: Predict activation risk
walkthrough.summary: Trained a churn model and surfaced high-risk accounts directly where CS teams collaborate, paired with recommended next actions.
walkthrough.code:
const score = riskModel.predict(accountSignals);
return score > 0.7 ? plan.nextBestAction(accountId) : null;

walkthrough.label: Collaborative alerts
walkthrough.summary: Synced alerts to Slack and in-app threads so GTM teams could swarm around opportunities with context-rich playbooks.

walkthrough.label: Query once, share everywhere
walkthrough.summary: Introduced reusable GraphQL fragments and caching so analysts could build dashboards that load in under a second.

sandbox.title: Forecast scenario sandbox
sandbox.description: Adjust retention levers and watch the workspace recalc KPIs in real time.

projects.title: Intelligent Revenue Advisor
projects.descriptionHtml: Led cross-functional delivery of a microservice suite providing smart nudges, anomaly detection, and dynamic pricing experiments for growth teams.

spotlight.headline: AI copilots for high-stakes revenue decisions
spotlight.overview: Partnered with growth, finance, and data science leaders to automate experiment design and anomaly detection across billions in ARR.
highlights: Built a simulation harness validating price changes against historical cohorts
Delivered a feature-flagged rollout mesh with governance guardrails
Standardized experimentation telemetry feeding a central insights lake

walkthrough.label: Sense anomalies early
walkthrough.summary: Tracked revenue trends across cohorts and auto-escalated anomalies with the story behind the spike for finance partners.
walkthrough.code:
const anomaly = detector.scan(windowedRevenue);
if (anomaly.score > 0.8) notify('finance', anomaly);

walkthrough.label: Design safe experiments
walkthrough.summary: Generated experiment templates with guardrail metrics so PMs could ship pricing tests without waiting on data science.

walkthrough.label: Govern rollouts
walkthrough.summary: Coordinated feature flags, anomaly detection, and finance approvals so price changes stayed within risk tolerances.

sandbox.title: Pricing experiment simulator
sandbox.description: Toggle guardrails and observe how the advisor recommends next best actions.
